TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TimerCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TimerCallback(state As Object)
type TimerCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 一个对象（包含与该委托所调用的方法相关的特定于应用程序的信息）或为 。

span.span: An object containing application-specific information relevant to the method invoked by this delegate, or .

summary.span: 表示处理来自 的调用的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles calls from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用委托指定由调用的方法。 `TimerCallback`Use a `TimerCallback` delegate to specify the method that is called by a . 此方法不会在创建计时器的线程中执行;它在系统提供的单独线程池线程中执行。This method does not execute in the thread that created the timer; it executes in a separate thread pool thread that is provided by the system. 委托在开始时间结束后调用方法一次, 并在调用方法之前继续对每个计时器间隔调用此方法, 或者在通过间隔值调用方法之前继续调用。 `TimerCallback`The `TimerCallback` delegate invokes the method once after the start time elapses, and continues to invoke it once per timer interval until the method is called, or until the method is called with the interval value . > [!NOTE] > 调用方法重载后, 可能会发生回调, 因为计时器会将回调排队等待线程池线程执行。Callbacks can occur after the method overload has been called, because the timer queues callbacks for execution by thread pool threads. 您可以使用方法重载来等待所有回调都已完成。You can use the method overload to wait until all callbacks have completed. 计时器委托在构造计时器时指定, 无法更改。The timer delegate is specified when the timer is constructed, and cannot be changed. 在`Timer` `Timer`构造函数的`dueTime`参数中传递的开始时间`period` , 并在参数中传递句点。The start time for a `Timer` is passed in the `dueTime` parameter of the `Timer` constructors, and the period is passed in the `period` parameter. 有关演示如何创建和使用`TimerCallback`委托的示例, 请参见。 For an example that demonstrates creating and using a `TimerCallback` delegate, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与`Timer`类一起使用的委托。The following code example shows how to create the delegate used with the `Timer` class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Timer/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Timer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Timer/VB/source.vb#1)]
